EmailTemplate.name: Mitigation Expiration
EmailTemplate.Description: Email Template for notifying certifiers that a mitigation they requested has expired.

Argument.name: identityName
Argument.Description: The full name (first and last) of the Identity object that has the mitigation.

Argument.name: itemDescription
Argument.Description: A short description of the item that was mitigated.

Argument.name: mitigationExpiration
Argument.Description: The sailpoint.object.MitigationExpiration that is sending this notification.

Argument.name: mitigator
Argument.Description: The full name (first and last) of the Identity that created the mitigation.

EmailTemplate.Subject: Allowed exception has expired for $!identityName
